Package charts

Class ChartModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • charts.ChartModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class ChartModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Instances of this class act as the models for the chart views. They request from the data provider and contain the candle data from which the charts are drawn and from that data calculate the values needed to draw the indicators.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChartModel​(Stock stock)
      Constructs a chart model holding data for the specified stock.
      ChartModel​(ApplicationPreferencesModel preferences, Stock stock)
      Constructs a chart model holding data for the specified stock and getting application preferences from the specified ApplicationPreferencesModel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChartModel

        public ChartModel​(Stock stock)
        Constructs a chart model holding data for the specified stock. This constructor is only used for the unit tests.
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock to which this chart model corresponds

      • ChartModel

        public ChartModel​(ApplicationPreferencesModel preferences,
                  Stock stock)
        Constructs a chart model holding data for the specified stock and getting application preferences from the specified ApplicationPreferencesModel.
        Parameters:
        preferences - the preferences model that holds the application preferences
        stock - the stock for which this chart model holds chart data

    • Method Detail

      • getCandles

        public java.util.List<Candle> getCandles()
        Gets the list of candles to draw. Used by the chart panel that draws the candles.
        Returns:
        the candles to draw

      • setCandles

        public void setCandles​(java.util.List<Candle> candles)
        Sets a list of candles that need to be drawn
        Parameters:
        candles - the new candle list

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval​(Intervals interval)
                 throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Sets the candle interval the user requests. Gets the appropriate candle data from the provider.
        Parameters:
        interval - the new interval for which the user requests candle data
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when the user requests more candles for the interval than the data provider provides

      • setNumberOfIntervals

        public void setNumberOfIntervals​(int numIntervals)
                          throws TooManyIntervalsException
        Sets the number of intervals the user requests.
        Parameters:
        numIntervals - the new number of intervals
        Throws:
        TooManyIntervalsException - thrown when the user requests more candles for the interval than the data provider provides

      • getNumberOfIntervals

        public int getNumberOfIntervals()
        Gets the number of intervals currently shown in the chart
        Returns:
        the number of intervals

        public ChartPanel getView()

        Returns:
        the view

        public void setView​(ChartPanel view)
        Sets the view that visualizes this data.
        Parameters:
        view - the new view

      • getIndicators

        public java.util.List<Indicator> getIndicators()
        Gets the indicators to draw.
        Returns:
        the indicators that currently need to be drawn

      • setIndicators

        Parameters:
        indicators - the new indicator list

      • calculateMovingAverage

        public double[] calculateMovingAverage​(int n)
        Calculate moving average.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of candles to use for the calculation
        Returns:
        a double array of calculated values

      • calculateUpperBollingerBand

        public double[] calculateUpperBollingerBand​(int n,
                                            int f)
        Calculate upper Bollinger Band.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of candles to use for the calculation
        f - the standard deviation multiplier to use for the calculation
        Returns:
        a double array of calculated values

      • calculateLowerBollingerBand

        public double[] calculateLowerBollingerBand​(int n,
                                            int f)
        Calculate lower Bollinger Band.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of candles to use for the calculation
        f - the standard deviation multiplier to use for the calculation
        Returns:
        a double array of calculated values

      • fireCandleDataChanged

        public void fireCandleDataChanged()
        Fire candle data changed. Informs the view it needs to repaint itself.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Handles events generated by the timer that fires when one instance of the currently selected interval is over. Then the candle list needs to be updated.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
